  • Method Details

    • insert

      public static int insert(String user_name, String password, LocalDate create_date, String created_by, Timestamp last_update, String last_updated_by) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new user into the client_schedule database with the given user name, password, create date, created by, and last updated by fields.
      Parameters:
      user_name - the user name for the new user
      password - the password for the new user
      create_date - the create date for the new user
      created_by - the created by field for the new user
      last_update - the last update timestamp for the new user
      last_updated_by - the last updated by field for the new user
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the insert operation
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL insert statement

    • select

      public static Users select(int user_id) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a user with the given user ID from the client_schedule database and returns it as a Users object.
      Parameters:
      user_id - the user ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      a Users object representing the user with the given user ID, or null if no such user exists in the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query

    • select

      public static boolean select(String user_name, String password) throws SQLException
      Checks if the given username and password match a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      user_name - The username to check.
      password - The password to check.
      Returns:
      true if the given username and password match a user in the database; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while executing the SQL query.

    • getUserNames

      public static HashMap<Integer,String> getUserNames() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a map of user IDs and corresponding usernames from the database.
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing the user IDs as keys and the corresponding usernames as values.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while executing the SQL query.
